comment: @rachel_cheung1 I'm confused by one point: is 44k for Wuhan or all of China?
Inferred number of cases is around 25k, while inferred number of infections, i.e. including those who are in incubation stage, is near 44k.

This number: 25,000 with #coronavirus and 44,000 infected in #Wuhan alone is based on the contagion rate of 2.3 - which is the most optimistic so far. A study at Imperial College London put it at 2.6 and researchers at Britains Lancaster University put it at 2.5.
@rachel_cheung1 So it's like double that for the total... I'll run some math extrapolating out later
